problem:
For those who want to exercise, multiple physical exercises alternately perform better than a single exercise.The exercise of a single project makes a small number of people develop muscles, and multiple physical exercises can alternately develop the muscle groups of the human body.The latter consumes more calories than the former.Q: If any of the following statements is true, is it most advantageous to strengthen the above argument? Answer Choices: (A)Among healthy people, health improvement is proportional to calorie consumption. (B)Exercise is the most effective way to exercise. (C)Those who recover from serious illnesses are not suitable for intense single physical exercise. (D)It is much more difficult to fully develop the muscle groups of the human body than to promote the development of a few muscles.
A: Among A through D, the answer is
